TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementOperationObserver extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理异步操作和处理异步接收的管理信息和事件。

span.span: Manages asynchronous operations and handles management information and events received asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration. 该示例使用类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。The example uses the class to handle management information and events asynchronously. span.span: Occurs when an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件数据Event Data 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量包含数据与此事件。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 以下属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (继承自) (inherited from )|获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||获取操作的完成状态。Gets the completion status of the operation.| ||获取或设置 WMI 对象内的其他状态信息。Gets or sets additional status information within a WMI object. 这可能为 null。This may be null.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration. 该示例使用类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。The example uses the class to handle management information and events asynchronously. span.span: Occurs when a new object is available.

summary.span: 它的出现是为了指示正在进行的操作的进度。

span.span: Occurs to indicate the progress of an ongoing operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件数据Event Data 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量包含数据与此事件。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 以下属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (继承自) (inherited from )|获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||获取操作已完成的当前工作量。Gets the current amount of work done by the operation. 这总是小于或等于 。This is always less than or equal to .| ||获取或设置有关操作进度的可选附加信息。Gets or sets optional additional information regarding the operation's progress.| ||获取该操作需要完成的总工作量。Gets the total amount of work required to be done by the operation.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
